definition: board/plank/bamboo or birch for corporal punishment
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to suffer beating/fig. to be severely criticized/to take a hammering

sentences.english: Not being able to manage both your Skis can be due to your left and right sides which are aligned differently.
sentences.chinese: 控制不好板子可能是因爲你的左右腿型不一致。

sentences.english: Some planks are patched and warped. Several bottom skids are broken.
sentences.chinese: 一些板子補過並彎翹了，幾根底梁斷了。

sentences.english: And the rest, some on boards, some on broken pieces of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的人，可以用板子，或船上的零碎東西上岸。

sentences.english: Each tier of the drums must be covered with plenty of boards in order to obtain even distribution of the weight.
sentences.chinese: 每層桶必須蓋上大量板子以便使得重量平均開來。

sentences.english: Board is the first Americans to pay.
Users only need to change the pin definitions, you can run on its own board.
sentences.chinese: 用戶只需更改管腳定義，即可在自己的板子上運行。

sentences.english: The plate loosed and stayed down.
sentences.chinese: 那塊板子鬆了，垂了下來。

sentences.english: In the past, people learning opera performance would be flogged by their mentor if they made any mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 以前人們學戲時，只要出一點錯，師傅就會打板子。

sentences.english: So you got like a surfboard-shaped board and put wheels on it, so they could ride it.
sentences.chinese: 找一塊衝浪板形狀的板子，加上輪子，就可以滑了。

sentences.english: After bat has been spread entirely, be about to go up play crural line.
sentences.chinese: 板子全部鋪好後，就要上踢腳線了。

sentences.english: Choose a medium-flexed ski if you want to ski on a variety of snow conditions and varied terrain.
sentences.chinese: 如果想適用多種地形和雪質，就選硬度適中的板子。

sentences.english: Keep in mind that your lower body is flexing down toward the skis, weighting your skis down into the snow through the turn.
sentences.chinese: 下身彎曲收縮，在轉彎的過程中將板子向下壓進雪裏。

sentences.english: I've spent the past three and a half years staring at grease boards full of equations.
sentences.chinese: 過去三年半時間我都在瞪着寫滿方程式的板子上。

sentences.english: The floor creaked as he stepped on a loose board.
sentences.chinese: 當他踩到一塊松板子時，地板吱吱作響。

sentences.english: And the rest, some on boards, and some on broken pieces of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的人，可以用板子，或船上的零碎東西上岸。

sentences.english: A lamp was burning on a board stuck into the clay beneath the picture.
sentences.chinese: 一盞燈被燃燒在一塊板子上的土在貼的圖片。

definition: bamboo clapper boards used in folk theater
to suffer beating/fig. to be severely criticized/to take a hammering
beating with wooden staves (as corporal punishment)
to suffer/to endure/to pull through (hard times)/to delay/to stall/to play for time/to dawdle
hammer drill for boring through rock
short note/slip of paper/stripe/(slang) cop/(old) prostitute
